name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in building high-performance applications primarily using **React**, **TypeScript**, **Next.js**, and **Tailwind** technology. My expertise extends to utilizing modern development tools such as **shadcn/ui**, **Storybook**, and **Vitest**, coupled with backend proficiency in **Node.js** and **PostgreSQL**. I have a solid foundation in cloud solutions, particularly with **Azure Kubernetes Service** and infrastructure management utilizing **Pulumi**. 
I am adept in working within collaborative environments utilizing tools like **GitHub**, **Linear**, **Notion**, and **Slack** to streamline workflows. My previous roles involved developing enterprise-grade platforms with a focus on compliance and security standards. I am committed to leveraging my comprehensive knowledge in frontend technologies and software engineering best practices to deliver user-focused solutions.
